title: Smiley Face Murders
description:
Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now from anywhere in the world.

Tonight, my special guest is investigator and author William Ramsey who's here to discuss the very chilling phenomena of The Smiley Face Murders.



Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
